In all likelihood, my intention will be to give them the same amount they're willing to pay me - which means I'll need to figure out what number N is that would allow us to meet this condition while also being fair and transparent. This process involves a bit of trial-and-error, as well as some creative problem-solving with numbers.

Finally, I will give $10.
